SELECT u.id AS userId, u.name, u.phone, MAX(r.reservation_date) AS lastVisitDate, COUNT(r.id) AS visitCount FROM user u JOIN reservation r ON u.id = r.user_id WHERE u.status = 'ACTIVE'
AND (u.name ILIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR u.phone ILIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%'))
GROUP BY u.id, u.name, u.phone ORDER BY lastVisitDate DESC
